statements: DELETE FROM demand_analysis WHERE demand_id = 101 AND demand_date = '2022-10-12';
DELETE FROM robust_forecasting_strategies WHERE strategy_name = 'Weighted Moving Average';
DELETE FROM robust_forecasting_strategies WHERE strategy_name = 'ARIMA' AND risk_assessment = 'High';
DELETE FROM demand_data WHERE quantity < 100 AND price > 50;
DELETE FROM ForecastData WHERE product_id = 101 AND forecast_date <= '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM SalesData WHERE sale_amount > 500 AND sale_date < '2022-05-01';
